Legal_Issue: Failure to conduct separate analysis under section 97 of IRPA
Evidence_Type: Evidence of ethnic persecution, state protection availability
Evaluation_Standard: Existence of credible risk and availability of state protection
Proceeding_Type: Refugee claim determination and subsequent judicial review
Application_Error: Alleged failure to conduct separate section 97 analysis
Legal_Standard: Separate analysis required under section 97 only if supported by evidence and state protection unavailable
Application_Factor: No specific risks identified under section 97 beyond section 96
Decision_Review_Issue: Whether RPD erred in not conducting separate section 97 analysis
Cause_of_Refusal: Insufficient evidence of lack of state protection under section 97
Evidentiary_Issues: No additional evidence supporting absence of state protection under section 97
Procedural_Fairness: RPD conducted adequate analysis under sections 96 and 97
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claimants challenged RPD's failure to analyze section 97 separately
Procedural_Issue: Requirement for separate legal analysis under distinct provisions
Omission_Type: Alleged omission of separate section 97 analysis
